attributes.action: Thank the people of WOOTON BASSETT for the honourable way in which they have recieved back the fallen soldiers back into the UK. Further more we also ask the PM to seek an honour by HM the Queen to be bestowed upon the town on behalf of the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The way in which the town of Wootoon Bassett has behaved in recieved back soldiers has been an absoulte credit to the British people and to the families and friends of the soldiers who have been brought back via there.  An award of gratitude should be bestowed upon the town in order to show the nations gratitude.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
